::Wolveritron::

    He could smell the sent of a Predacon, under the earth=
. He walked around and saw the entrance. He transformed and pulled a bazook=
a out of his arse. But not really, he pulled a grenade launcher out of his =
weapon slot, but it is near his arse.
    He aimed down the hole and locked=
 on to the signature of the Predacons. Wolveritron didn't care who it was, =
just that is was a Predacon, past tense.
    He fired 4 grenades into the h=
ole, hoping they would find they're mark. Then he lowered the weapon, still=
 at ready to get the Pred. (Drillbit that'd be you)
